New Records: Amen Thompson recorded a career-high 16 rebounds.
Key Match Events: Jalen Green scored 18 points in the first quarter and finished with 33 points and five triples.
Anthony Davis led the Lakers with 30 points, 13 rebounds, and five blocks.
Max Christie's pass to LeBron James was intercepted by Fred VanVleet in the final seconds.
LeBron James made a deep triple that was waved off due to an offensive foul on Anthony Davis.
Post-Match Reflections: LeBron James signaled for a timeout before Max Christie inbounded the ball.
Anthony Davis disagreed with the referee’s late whistle on the offensive foul.
Coach Redick stated that the inability to get defensive rebounds was the difference in the game.
Anthony Davis mentioned that second chance opportunities and offensive rebounds hurt the Lakers.
Miscellaneous Highlights: A Rockets fan drilled a halfcourt shot to win $25,000 during a break in the second quarter.
